snippet: The study by the World Health Organization and World Bank examined access to health services like prenatal care, child immunization and access to clean water.
abstract: World Health Organization and World Bank release report finding that at least 400 million people worldwide do not have access to essential health services.
lead_paragraph: The study by the World Health Organization and World Bank examined access to health services like prenatal care, child immunization and access to clean water.

headline.main: 400 Million Lack Basic Health Services, Report Finds
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Science and Heallth; 400 Million Lack Access to Health Care, Report Says
